column4: Exclusive: Microsoft responded quietly after detecting secret database hack in 2013
column5: Microsoft Corp's secret internal database for tracking bugs in its own software was broken into by a highly sophisticated hacking group more than four years ago  according to five former employees  in only the second known breach of such a corporate database.

column4: RPT-INSIGHT-Microsoft responded quietly after detecting secret database hack in 2013
column5: Oct 17 Microsoft Corp's secret internal database for tracking bugs in its own software was broken into by a highly sophisticated hacking group more than four years ago  according to five former employees  in only the second known breach of such a corporate database.

column4: INSIGHT-Microsoft responded quietly after detecting secret database hack in 2013

column4: Volvo unveils Polestar model in China  looks to rival Tesla 3
column5: SHANGHAI Volvo Cars and its Chinese parent have unveiled their first Polestar high performance electric car and pledged to invest 5 billion yuan ($760 million) in the brand  gearing up for intense competition to sell greener cars in the world's biggest auto market. | Video

column4: UPDATE 1-Volvo unveils Polestar model in China  looks to rival Tesla 3
column5: SHANGHAI  Oct 17 Volvo Cars and its Chinese parent have unveiled their first Polestar high performance electric car and pledged to invest 5 billion yuan ($760 million) in the brand  gearing up for intense competition to sell greener cars in the world's biggest auto market.

column4: BRIEF-Intel says to ship Intel Nervana Neural Network Processor before 2017-end
column5: * Intel says it will ship silicon for Neural Network Processing  the Intel Nervana Neural Network Processor  before the end of 2017- statement

column4: Patently tough: Long road ahead for Qualcomm in China case against Apple
column5: SHANGHAI/BEIJING Qualcomm Inc wants to hit Apple Inc where it hurts most: iPhone sales in China - one of its biggest global markets where most of its flagship smartphones are made.
